local_intent: Lower the grasped red cube until gentle table contact is detected, with a limited retry and explicit contact verification.
assumptions: Arm is already positioned above the intended table placement spot
Vertical lowering is collision-free in the local vicinity
coherence_with_global: Implements the contact-aware lowering step of the global sequence using the same parameters; verifies object is held, performs LowerUntilContact, and confirms contact.
